string-array.name: addition_explanations
string-array.item:
1 

You had 5 apples, and your friend gave you 2 more. 

Now, how many apples do you have? 

Add 5 and 2 together. 

You have 7 apples in total now. 

We count the apples one by one. 

We start with 5... 6... 7! 

Now, you have a total of 7 apples!
